powerwalk.model.world

Class Person

  • java.lang.Object
    • powerwalk.model.GameObject
      • powerwalk.model.world.Entity
        • powerwalk.model.world.Person
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Interactable

    public class Person
extends Entity
    This class represents a mobile, non-aggressive Entity in the RSBot environment that can be interacted with.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int[] values
      Values that specifically define Persons or NPCs in the RSBot environment.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Person(int x, int y, int z, int rawValue)
      Creates a new Person at the given position.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void talkTo()
      This method tries the first method of interaction that this Person can perform that contains either "talk" or "speak".

    • Field Detail

      • values

        public static final int[] values
        Values that specifically define Persons or NPCs in the RSBot environment.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Person

        public Person(int x,
      int y,
      int z,
      int rawValue)
        Creates a new Person at the given position. the rawValue indicates the type of object as provided by the RSBot environment.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of this object
        y - the y-coordinate of this object
        z - the z-coordinate of this object
        rawValue - the raw value from the environment specifying the type

    • Method Detail

      • talkTo

        public void talkTo()
            throws OutOfReachException
        This method tries the first method of interaction that this Person can perform that contains either "talk" or "speak".
        Throws:
        OutOfReachException - when the Person is not nearby.
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - when no suitable method was found.
